metadata.title: The first RA MCUs with the Cortex-M33 CPU with the I3C interface

sections.content:
Question:
Are there any RA4 or RA6 series products that support the I3C interface?
Answer:
The RA4E2 and RA6E2 are provided with an I3C interface. In addition, they  supports various other communication interfaces such as USB FS, CAN-FD, SSI, and HDMI-CEC, enabling use in a wide range of applications.
Suitable Products
RA4E2, RA6E2
